subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Football
Buildings (Structures)
lead_paragraph: St. Louis Cardinals president Mark Lamping’s experience includes overseeing the demolition of old Busch Stadium, and the construction of the nearly $400-million stadium that replaced it.
snippet: St. Louis Cardinals president Mark Lamping’s experience includes overseeing the demolition of old Busch Stadium, and the construction of the nearly $400-million stadium that replaced it.
